stimulusHtml: All of the following were concerns about the Articles of Confederation that led to the calling of the Constitutional Convention of 1787 EXCEPT
choicesHtml: dissatisfaction over safeguards of individual rights and liberties
fear for the stability of the central government
desire to promote trade among the states
the need to give the central government the power to levy taxes
dissatisfaction with the central governmentâ€™s ability to provide for national defense
